nodes.description: Search engine based on the Lucene library. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents
nodes.name: Elasticsearch

nodes.description: Lightweight shipper for forwarding and centralizing log data. Installed as an agent on your servers, Filebeat monitors the log files or locations that you specify, collects log events, and forwards them either to Elasticsearch or Logstash for indexing.
nodes.name: Filebeat

nodes.description: Window into the Elastic Stack. Specifically, it's a browser-based analytics and search dashboard for Elasticsearch.
nodes.name: Kibana

nodes.description: Wazuh is a free and open source platform for threat detection, security monitoring, incident response and regulatory compliance. It can be used to monitor endpoints, cloud services and containers, and to aggregate and analyze data from external sources.
nodes.name: Wazuh agent

nodes.description: Navigate through the Wazuh data using visualizations in a simple and understandable way. It also allows you to manage the configuration and capabilities of the Wazuh server.
nodes.name: Wazuh app for Kibana

nodes.description: Navigate through the Wazuh data using visualizations in a simple and understandable way. It also allows you to manage the configuration and capabilities of the Wazuh server.
nodes.name: Wazuh app for Splunk

nodes.description: The Wazuh dashboard is a flexible and intuitive web user interface for mining, analyzing, and visualizing security events and alerts data. It is also used for the management and monitoring of the Wazuh platform. Additionally, it provides features for role-based access control (RBAC) and single sign on (SSO).  This is based in the OpenSearch Dashboards distribution.
nodes.name: Wazuh dashboard

nodes.description: The Wazuh indexer is a highly scalable, full-text search and analytics engine. This Wazuh central component indexes and stores alerts generated by the Wazuh server and provides near real-time data search and analytics capabilities. The Wazuh indexer can be configured as a single-node or multi-node cluster, providing scalability and high availability. This is based in the OpenSearch distribution.
nodes.name: Wazuh indexer

nodes.description: Wazuh is a free and open source platform for threat detection, security monitoring, incident response and regulatory compliance. It can be used to monitor endpoints, cloud services and containers, and to aggregate and analyze data from external sources.
nodes.name: Wazuh manager
